settings.heading: TITANTWO
settings.text: The most advanced gaming device that allows you to use your favorite controller on any console, create macros, run scripts, and gain the competitive edge with unprecedented customization.

settings.title: Converters, Adapters and Crossover Devices
settings.description: Connect your favorite controller to multiple supported gaming systems with Titan Two. This eliminates the need for separate adapters, converters, or crossover devices, offering an affordable and efficient all-in-one solution.

settings.title: Mods, Macros and Combos
settings.description: Activate unique MODs, combos, and macros like rapid-fire, anti-recoil, turbo, drop-shot, and more with ease. Simply load them into your game using drag-and-drop Gamepacks or community scripts — no extra tools or hardware required.

settings.title: Keyboard and Mouse on Consoles
settings.description: Enjoy full keyboard and mouse support directly through Titan Two or via Gtuner IV from your PC. This setup gives unmatched customization, letting you play console games with flexibility and precision.

settings.title: FightSticks, Steering Wheels and Joysticks
settings.description: Titan Two supports virtually any HID gaming device, including fight sticks, steering wheels, joysticks, foot pedals, and more. Easily connect and use a wide variety of peripherals without compatibility issues.

settings.title: Full-Featured Scripting Language
settings.description: Create scripts, combos, and macros with millisecond precision. Automate commands for motion sensors, touchpads, and other inputs to enhance gameplay with endless customization possibilities.

settings.title: Programming Software for Windows and Mac
settings.description: Gtuner IV is a cross-platform tool for configuring, updating, and programming Titan Two. It offers powerful features in a user-friendly interface, making customization and device management simple.

settings.title: GPC Scripting Language
settings.description: C-like syntax for creating powerful gaming scripts

settings.title: Visual Programming
settings.description: Drag-and-drop interface for beginners with no coding experience

settings.title: Real-time Testing
settings.description: Test your scripts in real-time with visual feedback

settings.title: Community Scripts
settings.description: Access a library of community-created scripts for popular games

settings.title: Device Management
settings.description: Update firmware, manage profiles, and configure device settings

settings.heading: Gtuner IV Software
settings.description: Unlock the full potential of your TITAN TWO with our advanced programming software.
settings.subdescription: Gtuner IV is a comprehensive development environment that allows you to create, test, and deploy custom scripts to your TITAN TWO device. From simple button remapping to complex macros, the possibilities are endless.
settings.button_note: Available for Win10(x64), Win8.1(x64), Win7(x64), OS X 10.13+

settings.title: Processor
settings.description: 32-bit ARM Cortex-M4 CPU running at 168MHz with hardware floating point unit

settings.title: Memory
settings.description: 192KB RAM, 1MB Flash Memory for firmware and scripts storage

settings.title: Connectivity
settings.description: 2x USB 2.0 Type-A ports, 2x USB 2.0 Type-B ports, 1x Mini-USB programming port

settings.title: Power
settings.description: USB powered (5V), no external power supply needed

settings.title: Dimensions
settings.description: 110mm x 55mm x 20mm (L x W x H)

settings.title: Weight
settings.description: 85 grams

settings.heading: Device Specifications
settings.description: The TITAN TWO is engineered with cutting-edge technology to deliver unmatched performance and reliability.

settings.product_description: The most advanced gaming device that allows you to use your favorite controller on any console, create macros, run scripts, and gain the competitive edge with unprecedented customization.
settings.product_features: Universal controller compatibility,Mods and macros support,Cross-platform gaming,Scripting capabilities,Windows and macOS support

settings.product_description: Wireless connectivity for your TITAN TWO device. Enjoy lag-free gaming with Bluetooth support.
settings.product_features: Wireless connection,Low latency,Long battery life,Easy setup,Compatible with all controllers

settings.product_description: Complete set of cables and adapters for all your gaming needs. Everything you need to connect your devices.
settings.product_features: Multiple cable types,High quality connectors,Compatible with all consoles,Durable construction,Plug and play

settings.heading: TITANTWO Products
settings.description: Discover our range of gaming devices and accessories designed to enhance your gaming experience.

settings.heading: About TITANTWO
settings.content:
TITANTWO is the most advanced gaming device that allows you to use your favorite controller on any console, create macros, run scripts, and gain the competitive edge with unprecedented customization.

Whether you're a casual gamer or a competitive esports player, TITANTWO provides the tools you need to enhance your gaming experience across all platforms.
settings.features: Universal controller compatibility,Powerful mods and macros,Cross-platform gaming,Advanced scripting capabilities,Windows and macOS support,Community-driven scripts
